message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. It's a great value considering its worth of $150 to you. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to pay closer to $110.  What do you think?
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I'm willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $115 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
